revision.comment: "otherwise the projectile is spawned as the velocity is effectively doubled." Hmm ZDoom bug or vanilla bug?
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_FireSigil4'''
(''no parameter'')
Plays the sound "weapon/sigilcharge" on the Weapon channel, and takes 16 health points from the player. If the player has a target a {{Class|SpectralLightningBigV1}} is fired and the tracer target is set, otherwise the projectile is spawned as the velocity is effectively doubled. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sigil}} and derived classes.
